subject: RE:What is the best solution to test Web Services(not normal web app) public APIs?
msgSnippet: Jirong, You can try wsUnit for testing WebServices. It is a simple WAR file that generates responses based on static XML payload . It is being developed by
messageBody:
Jirong, You can try wsUnit for testing WebServices. It is a simple WAR
file that generates responses based on static XML "payload". It is
being developed by one of my co-workers and we are currently using it
in out project and works for "stateless" services. You can get it from
https://wsunit.dev.java.net/.
--
Visit my weblog: http://www.jroller.com/page/cyblogue
